pullRequest.title: Another attempt to resolve RemoteServiceException's
pullRequest.bodyText: Moved calling BlockchainServiceImpl.startForeground(...) into main thread to avoid RemoteServiceExceptions

commit.message: Moved calling BlockchainServiceImpl.startForeground(...) into main thread to avoid RemoteServiceExceptions

nodes.bodyText: We still need to pass the blockchainState here so the notification will be updated with the sync state.
We should keep the blockchainState parameter for the reasons mentioned in the other comments.

commit.message: Fixed the bug with updating the sync state in notification.
